name: feathered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having feathers: They discovered remarkable fossils of a feathered dinosaur.
decorated with or made using feathers: She wore a green suit, a feathered hat and black gloves.
having threads, lines, or edges of different lengths, giving a soft appearance: feathered hair The early 1980s was a time of feathered hair and pastel clothes. Instead of one harsh line, apply the paint in small, feathered strokes. The petals have feathered edges.
(of an animal's body, tail, or legs) having long hairs that hang down: The dog was a huge and shaggy animal with a great feathered tail. The Sheltie's legs are feathered.

In winter, the ptarmigan has thickly feathered feet and toes acting as snowshoes.He appeared as a feathered angel.The arrow was made of a single hard stick, feathered and pointed with transparent flint.The dress was hand-painted silk with feathered edges.I love the blue feathered edging on the ceramic plates.I wore my hair in a feathered layer cut.
